matchupKeys: use lowercase with underscore, e.g. bb_vs_btn, sb_vs_co
handNotation: Pairs: '22'..'AA'. Suited: 'A2s'. Offsuit: 'KTo'. Shorthand ranges use '-' and '+' and ranges like 'A2s-A5s', '22-99', 'KTo+'
description: Modular preflop engine for 6-max cash (100bb, no antes). RFI files describe opening ranges per position. Facing files describe defender buckets vs an open (3bet_small/3bet_big/call/fold). SB files may include limps.
